title: Bug 43366Session Statistics command in manager fails with "Unknown command /sessions"
description: Bug 43366Session Statistics command in manager fails with "Unknown command /sessions"
OB: A documentation page for Tomcat 6 athttp://tomcat.apache.org/tomcat6.0doc/managerhowto.htmlSession%20Statisticsallows for the following command to be used in the manager:http://localhost/manager/sessions?path=/This used to work in Tomcat 5.In Tomcat 6, the following error is returned:FAILUnknown command /sessionsI have created two different installations of Tomcat 6.0.14 (one on CentOS 5,and one on Fedora 7). Both installations exhibit the same failure.
